    #include<algorithm>
    #include<queue>

    #include<cmath>
     
    #define ll long long
    #define ull unsigned long long
    #define mod 1000000007
    #define inf 1
    using namespace std;
    vector<vector<double> > dpd(2501,vector<double>(2501,-1));
 
    double dp(int n1,int r1)
    {
    //cerr<<n1<<" "<<r1<<endl;
    if(r1<0||r1>n1/2)return inf;
    if(n1==2)return 1;
    if(n1==2*r1)return r1;
    if(dpd[n1][r1]!=-1)return dpd[n1][r1];
    double n=n1,r=r1;
    double ans=0;
     
     
    double p1=r/(n-r);
    ans+=p1*(dp(n1-2,r1-1)+1);
     
    double p2=1/(n-r-1);
    ans+=(1-p1)*(p2)*(dp(n1-2,r1)+1);
     
    double p3=r/(n-r-1);
    ans+=(1-p1)*(p3)*(dp(n1-2,r1)+2);
     
    ans+=(1-p1)*(1-p2-p3)*(dp(n1,r1+2)+1);
     
    dpd[n1][r1]=ans;
    return ans;
    }
    void doit(int k)
    {
    double ans=dp(k,0);
    double x = 0.0001 * floor(ans * 10000.0 + 0.5);
    printf("%0.4f\n",x);
    }
    int main()
    {
    int n,m;
    while(!feof(stdin))
    {n=0;m=0;
    scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
    if(n>0&&m>0&&n<51&&m<51)doit(n*m);
    }
    return 0;
    }
